title: How climate change affects animal migration
description: How is climate change affecting animal migration?

vocabItems.definition: move to another place because of the weather or temperature

vocabItems.word: what kind of (something, e.g. price, distance) are we talking?
vocabItems.definition: used to rephrase a question that starts with how much or how far
something nobody knows about that gives you an advantage over a problem or enemy
used to explain the size or importance of something, particularly when that thing is difficult to imagine
